-- | Parser for Java .class files
--   
--   Parses compiled Java .class files into the syntax tree of the
--   language-java package
@package language-java-classfile
@version 0.1

module Language.Java.ClassFile
getClass :: Get TypeDecl
nameConstructor :: String
instance Show Attribute
instance Show Constant
instance Show ConstantValue
